name: Project with library
description: Create a project in C language with a library and usage example.
files_included:
**CMakeLists.txt:** Configuration file for building your project.
**main.c:** Source file with empty main function.
**CMakeLists.txt:** Configuration file for building your library.
**lib.c:** Empty ready-to-edit file for your library logic.
outputs:
**.hex:** Hexadecimal binary file for flashing to the target.
**.a:** A static library file with precompiled code.
